entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers late in the evening. Rain beginning near midnight. Fog patches developing in the evening. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 7:57 PM AST Friday 30 December 2022
